references.reason: This paper introduces the axiomatic properties for attribution methods, which are the foundation of path-based attribution methods and are used to evaluate the proposed method in this paper.

references.paper_title: Smoothgrad: removing noise by adding noise
references.reason: This paper proposes a method to reduce noise in attribution by adding noise to the input image, which is a baseline method and is compared with the proposed method in this paper.
This paper introduces the denoising diffusion probabilistic model, which is the foundation of the proposed method in this paper.

references.paper_title: Guided integrated gradients: An adaptive path method for removing noise
references.reason: This paper proposes a method to reduce noise in attribution by using an adaptive path, which is a baseline method and is compared with the proposed method in this paper.

references.paper_title: Learning deep features for discriminative localization
references.reason: This paper introduces Grad-CAM, which is a baseline method and is compared with the proposed method in this paper.
